analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.stanfordnlp.StanfordPosTagger
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: printTagSet
configurationParameter.description:
Log the tag set(s) when a model is loaded.
Default: false

configurationParameter.name: language
configurationParameter.description: Use this language instead of the document language to resolve the model and tag set mapping.

configurationParameter.name: modelVariant
configurationParameter.description: Variant of a model the model. Used to address a specific model if here are multiple models for one language.

configurationParameter.name: modelLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location from which the model is read.

configurationParameter.name: POSMappingLocation
configurationParameter.description: Location of the mapping file for part-of-speech tags to UIMA types.

configurationParameter.name: internTags
configurationParameter.description:
Use the String#intern() method on tags. This is usually a good idea to avoid spaming the heap with thousands of strings representing only a few different tags.
Default: false

configurationParameter.name: ptb3Escaping
configurationParameter.description: Enable all traditional PTB3 token transforms (like -LRB-, -RRB-).

configurationParameter.name: quoteBegin
configurationParameter.description: List of extra token texts (usually single character strings) that should be treated like opening quotes and escaped accordingly before being sent to the parser.

configurationParameter.name: quoteEnd
configurationParameter.description: List of extra token texts (usually single character strings) that should be treated like closing quotes and escaped accordingly before being sent to the parser.

configurationParameter.name: maxSentenceTokens
configurationParameter.description: Sentences with more tokens than the specified max amount will be ignored if this parameter is set to a value larger than zero. The default value zero will allow all sentences to be POS tagged.
